  6. from .ftp import ftp_check
  7. from .repo import bitbucket_check, github_check
  8. from ftp_deploy.conf import *
  11. class service_check(object):
  13. """Service check class, what group together all checking points. Return 'fails' and 'message' lists"""
  15. def __init__(self, service):
  16. self.service = service
  17. self.message = list()
  18. self.fails = [False, False, False, False]
  20. def check_log(self):
  21. """Check logs"""
  22. if self.service.pk is not None:
  23. log_fail = self.service.log_set.all().filter(status=False).filter(skip=False).count()
  24. if log_fail:
  25. self.message.append('<b>Log</b>: Deploy Fails(%d)' % log_fail)
  26. self.fails[0] = True
  28. def check_repo(self):
  29. """Check repositories connection, along with POST Hook"""
  30. if self.service.repo_source == 'bb':
  31. repo = bitbucket_check(BITBUCKET_SETTINGS['username'], BITBUCKET_SETTINGS['password'], self.service)
  32. elif self.service.repo_source == 'gh':
  33. repo = github_check(GITHUB_SETTINGS['username'], GITHUB_SETTINGS['password'], self.service)
  35. repo_fail, repo_fail_message = repo.check_all()
  36. if repo_fail:
  37. self.message.append(repo_fail_message)
  38. self.fails[1] = True
  40. hook_fail, hook_fail_message = repo.check_hook_exist()
  41. if hook_fail:
  42. self.message.append(hook_fail_message)
  43. self.fails[2] = True
  45. def check_ftp(self):
  46. """Check FTP connection"""
  47. ftp = ftp_check(self.service.ftp_host, self.service.ftp_username, self.service.ftp_password, self.service.ftp_path)
  48. ftp_fail, ftp_fail_message = ftp.check_all()
  49. ftp.quit()
  51. if ftp_fail:
  52. self.message.append(ftp_fail_message)
  53. self.fails[3] = True
  55. def check_all(self):
  56. self.check_log()
  57. self.check_repo()
  58. self.check_ftp()
  60. return self.fails, self.message
  62. class absolute_url(object):
  64. """Build absolute url to root url without trailing slash"""
  66. def __init__(self, request):
  67. self.request = request
  69. def build(self):
  70. return self.request.build_absolute_uri('/')[:-1]
  73. class LockError(Exception):
  75. """Exception if service is locked"""
  77. def __str__(self):
  78. return 'Deploy failed because service is Locked!'
